features: Separate databases for different stats (this makes it easier to show linked database views).; Pre-filled with spells from the Player's Handbook (sourced fromthis JSON fileand tidied up for Notion); Plenty of views to get started with (spell cards, equipment list, skills and saving throws); Relations and rollups to help you automatically calculate certain stats.
